articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					 Kim Jong Il went round the newly built combined production control room, the UHP electric arc furnace with a capacity of 100 tons, the relay ingot shop and the substation of the complex and various other production processes for hours to acquaint himself in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					 Watching for a long while the smelters at tapping work before the above-said electric arc furnace, he warmly encouraged them working with sweat running down in beads in their patriotic service for the prosperity and development of the country and appreciated their efforts.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the Juche-based molten iron being churned out in an endless stream from the large furnace, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the complex have successfully built a modern Juche iron production base with a great capacity in hearty response to the Party's policy to put the metallurgical industry on a Juche basis, thus steadily boosting the production of steel.
					
					 The gasification of anthracite and the process of not using cokes, entirely depending on the locally available raw materials, are the philosophy governing the development of the economy in the DPRK, he noted, stressing the need to hold fast to this precious truth learned through the arduous struggle as a lifeline.
					
					 He advanced highly important tasks to be fulfilled by the complex.
					
					 He said that the most important task before the complex is to keep the production of iron and steel going at a high rate depending on the existing solid Juche iron production base.
					
					 The enterprises related to the complex have an important role to play in keeping the production going at a high rate at the complex, he said, underscoring the need for the power stations, ore and coal mines to increase the production of electricity and concentrated iron ore and coal and provide them to it in time.
					
					 He praised the workers of the complex as heroic ones as they have always upheld the Party with the production of iron and steel, bearing deep in mind the teaching of President Kim Il Sung that the complex is as important as the "Height 1211" in the development of nation's economy. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that they would emerge honorable victors in the final charge for opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation with the same vim and vigor with which they demonstrated the mettle of the Korean people in the post-war rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek of the C.C., the WPK and its First Vice-Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Zimbabwean President
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Robert Gabriel Mugabe, President of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on February 18 on the occasion of his 86th birthday.
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam sincerely wished the Zimbabwean president good health and happiness and greater success in his work for national unity and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Congratulates Guinean PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Congratulates Guinean PM
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Premier Kim Yong Il sent a congratulatory message to Jean Marie Dore upon his appointment as prime minister of the Government of National Unity of Guinea on Thursday. 
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow strong, the message wished him success in his responsible work for the sovereignty of the country, national unity and socio-economic stability.

articles.title: Gifts from Foreigners
articles.content:
Gifts from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from the mayor of Khabarovsk and directors of companies of Russia, the director of a Syrian company and the governor of Oaxaca State, the former mayor of Oaxaca City and the representative of the Oaxaca State juvenile volleyball team of Mexico on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The gifts were handed to DPRK officials concerned working in those countries.

articles.title: Head of Japanese Delegation Interviewed
articles.content:
Head of Japanese Delegation Interviewed
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Yuji Yokouchi, head of the visiting delegation for the study of the Juche idea who is member of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism, was interviewed by a KCNA reporter at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Feb. 19.
					 He said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has made tireless efforts and devoted all his wisdom to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people, adding that his reverence for           Kim Jong Il grew deeper while staying in the DPRK. 
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the army and people of the DPRK under the uplifted banner of Songun. 
					
					 Socialist Korea has demonstrated its dignity and honor despite stern trials and difficulties as it is holding him in high esteem as an outstanding leader, he said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people have remarkably increased the overall national power under his leadership. 
					
					 Whenever I visit the DPRK, I am deeply impressed by the Korean people who have made great successes in socialist construction. 
					
					 They are dynamically stepping up the building of a thriving nation to materialize his far-reaching plan. 
					
					 World-startling successes are being registered in this course. 
					
					 The reality of the DPRK goes to prove that the people under the tested leadership of a peerlessly great man can display inexhaustible strength. 
					
					 I am convinced that the Korean people will open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: US Scenario to Stifle DPRK by Force Blasted
articles.content:
US Scenario to Stifle DPRK by Force Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Recently high-ranking officials of the U.S. Department of Defense blustered that in case of "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula the U.S. would support the U.S. naval and air forces in the main and has secured flexibility enough to support the ground combat forces. Earlier, the U.S. secretary of Defense uttered that in case a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula the U.S. would hurl its naval and air forces at its outset and additionally mobilize its ground force.
					 Meanwhile, the assistant secretary of Defense blustered the U.S. could win on the peninsula even without using nuclear weapons. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: These reckless outbursts can be let loose only by those who consider the outbreak of the second Korean war as an established fact as they betray the invariable scenario of the U.S. to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is paying lip-service to "stability on the Korean Peninsula" and "the prevention of a war," but it has never given up its scenario for invading the DPRK and putting the whole of Korea under its domination.
					
					 The U.S. war-thirsty forces are making bellicose remarks, while holding confabs for invading the DPRK though it advanced an important and flexible proposal for concluding a peace treaty as the best way of building confidence for the denuclearization of the peninsula and has made every sincere effort for its materialization. This cannot be construed otherwise than an outright denial of peace and a declaration of a war.
					
					 It is foolish and ridiculous for the U.S. to do harm to the DPRK by means of its naval and air force preponderance.
					
					 It is the wildest fancy for the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can go safe after igniting a war on the peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces had better behave themselves for the fate and future of their own country.

articles.title: US touted "Missile Threat" from DPRK Dismissed
articles.content:
US touted "Missile Threat" from DPRK Dismissed
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now asserting that the allocation of 9.9 billion U.S. dollars for the implementation of the plan for establishing the missile defense (MD) system is meant for "coping with the missile threats" from such countries as the DPRK and Iran. 
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is making much fuss as if something very serious had happened, grumbling it is afraid of missiles of small countries. This sounds very funny from every angle. 
					
					 The symptom of serious "missile allergy" shown by the U.S. which boasts of being relatively advanced in the field of strategic offensive weapons only betrays its sinister purpose and calculation.
					
					 The U.S. is now going in the direction of throwing a missile defense network worldwide. 
					
					 It is the U.S. military strategy to cover the whole world with its missile defense network in a bid to beat its rivals in the field of strategic offensive weapons and go unchallenged and establish a definite military domination over other countries.
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that its campaign for spreading the fiction about "threat", pulling up such countries as the DPRK and Iran, would help justify its arms race. This is nothing but a foolish daydream.
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. justify its wild ambition to act an international gendarme, lording it over the world after putting it under its military control. It will never be able to escape due rebuff and denunciation from the international community.

articles.title: Officials Called upon to Hold "We Serve the People!"
articles.content:
Officials Called upon to Hold "We Serve the People!"
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The key to winning a victory in the ongoing drive for a great surge in improving the people's standard of living is to continue holding aloft the slogan "We Serve the People!" put up by the Workers' Party of Korea, observes Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial.
					 This slogan represents a revolutionary banner for cementing the DPRK's single-minded unity as firm as a rock by thoroughly implementing the revolutionary mass line of the WPK and a militant banner reflecting its steadfast will to realize all the ideals and happiness of the DPRK people, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The slogan "We Serve the People!" is based on the WPK's outlook on the people and its philosophy of love for them that it is necessary to bring a flower into full bloom even on a rock and pluck a star from the sky if desired by them.
					
					 Unshakable are the determination and will of the WPK to wage a dynamic all-out offensive to improve the people's standard of living on the basis of the great victory and success gained in the drive for a great revolutionary surge in an effort to enable the Korean people to fully enjoy blessings under socialism as they weathered stern trials following the Party.
					
					It is the political creed of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that the popular masses are the dearest and strongest beings in the world and nothing should be spared for them.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation is sure to triumph thanks to the great leadership of the WPK which translates all the ideals of the people into realities under the uplifted slogan "We Serve the People!" and its service personnel and people who remain true to its Songun leadership, cherishing the faith that "When the Party Is Determined, We Can Do Anything!"

articles.title: Koreans Urged to Remain True to "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
Koreans Urged to Remain True to "By Our Nation Itself"
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation will surely accomplish the historic cause of independent reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" true to the idea and leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, observes Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It says:
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" propounded by Kim Jong Il represents the aspiration and wishes of the Koreans to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by their concerted efforts by beating back the foreign aggression and interference. It also clearly indicates the way of developing the north-south relations and achieving the peace of the country and the prosperity common to the nation with the might of independence and unity.
					
					 Reflected in the above-said idea are the idea of national self-determination that the issue of the nation should be settled by itself, the awareness and pride in the advantages of the Korean nation and faith and will of the compatriots in the north and the south to independently reunify the country by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The period since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration witnessed the mounting compatriotic atmosphere, an exceptionally great zeal of the Koreans for reunification and patriotism and landmark achievements in the reunification movement.
					
					This goes to prove that the above-said idea is in line with the aspiration of the Koreans and the need of the times. 
					
					 It is one of the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il that he advanced the idea acceptable to every member of the Korean nation and the great preposition reflecting the requirements of the history of the nation as an idea guiding the times, providing a bright prospect for accomplishing the cause of national reunification, the cause of great national unity.
					
					 A lot of difficulties and trials are still lying in the way of national reunification but the cause of national reunification is sure to triumph thanks to the idea of "By our nation itself" and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Joint Military Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Joint Military Exercises Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet army are contemplating staging the DPRK-targeted Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises across south Korea again from March 8 to 18.
					 The south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" announced it on Feb. 17.
					
					 Huge forces including more than 18,000 U.S. troops present in south Korea and overseas are said to be involved in the exercises. 
					
					 The warmongers are saying that the exercises are aimed to "improve defence capability" and the like, but this is no more than a smokescreen to cover up their offensive nature for invading the north.

articles.title: Ri Ryol Ri Emerges Japanese Featherweight Champion
articles.content:
Ri Ryol Ri Emerges Japanese Featherweight Champion
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Korean pro-boxer in Japan Ri Ryol Ri trounced Japanese featherweight boxer No. 1 Kazunori Takayama in a match held in Tokyo on February 6, emerging a featherweight champion in Japan.
					 From the beginning of the match Ri, confidently holding the initiative, gave strong punches to the rival.
					
					 He put the Japanese rival on the defensive by displaying special techniques including strong straight blows, swift and correct punches, and thus registered high points in every round.
					
					 At the match he fully displayed his diverse techniques he acquired as a member of the boxing group while studying at Joson University.
					
					 When Ri was declared a winner with the decision of 3:0 (97:95, 97:94, 98:94), Korean supporters sent warm cheers to him, hugging with one another.

articles.title: Brazilian Figure Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Brazilian Figure Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The relations between the Brazilian Communist Party and the Workers' Party of Korea were forged in the joint struggle for building an independent and peaceful new world against the U.S. imperialists and for the international unity among progressive political parties.
					 Renato Ravello, national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, said this when the DPRK ambassador to Brazil paid a courtesy call on him on Feb. 5.
					
					 He stressed that the experience gained by the WPK in its struggle for socialist construction and the country's reunification is of great help to the Brazilian party building and activities.
					
					 He said that he would make a positive contribution to further consolidating the relations between the two parties and developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and peoples in various fields.

articles.title: Bangladesh Figure Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Bangladesh Figure Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- February 16, birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, is the great auspicious day when the Korean people were blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					 Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, said this when he met the DPRK ambassador to his country, on Feb. 13.
					
					 He said that the Korean people have firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country overcoming all trials and difficulties of history as they have Kim Jong Il as the leader of the Korean revolution.
					
					 All the successes gained by the Korean people in the stand-off with imperialism and socialist construction greatly encourage the progressive humankind, he said.
					
					 He expressed firm belief that the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and people of the DPRK under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il would achieve greater success in their heroic struggle to defend socialist motherland and build a reunified thriving nation under the great banner of Songun.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Government ministries, political parties, organizations and institutions of different countries and personages from all walks of life sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Among them were the Ministry of the Public Security of Laos, the Laos-Korea Friendship Association, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, the Peruvian Communist Party, the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar, the Union Solidarity and Development Association of Myanmar, the Yangon City Development Committee and the Table-Tennis Association, the International Commerce Promotion Center and the Diamond Love Princess Co. Ltd., of Myanmar, the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China, the vice-prime minister and foreign minister of Laos, the vice-prime minister and minister of National Defence of Laos, the secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the chairman of the Organization Commission and the chairman of the Propaganda and Education Ideological Commission of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the president of the Central Committee of the Lao Women's Union, a secretar
					
					 y of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, the general secretary of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea, a secretary and an adviser for national security of the General People's Committee of Libya, the chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru and the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.
					
					 Meanwhile, a floral basket was sent to the DPRK embassy in Beijing by the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Feb. 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi figures paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy to Bangladesh on Feb. 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They include Dilip Barua, minister of Industries who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Mujahidul Islam Selim, general secretary of the C.C., the Bangladesh Communist Party, Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, Khaleq Zaman Bhuiyan, general secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, and the secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee.
					
					 They laid a floral basket before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the reunification of the country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Cuba
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting was held by the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces and a meeting and film show by an agriculture and stock-farming enterprise of Cuba on Feb. 5 and 10 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the functions were personages of the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the said enterprise and masses. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Officials Should Become Genuine Servants Dedicating Themselves to the People" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house in Leipzig of Germany on Feb. 12.
					 The work, published on Oct. 28, Juche 92 (2003), elucidates the necessity for the officials to become genuine servants of people called "our official" and tasks to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo Siderurgico Hwanghae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo Siderurgico Hwanghae
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo Siderurgico Hwanghae.
					Al recorrer durante largo tiempo la nuevamente acondicionada sala de control combinado de produccion, el horno electrico UHP de 100 toneladas, el taller de moldeado continuo de lingotes, la estacion electrica Hwangchol y otros procesos productivos, se entero en detalles del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion. 
					
					Viendo por un buen rato la colada ante el horno electrico UHP de 100 toneladas nuevamente construido, estimulo cordialmente a los fundidores y reconocio los esfuerzos de ellos que derraman el sudor signado de patriotismo por la prosperidad y el desarrollo del pais.
					
					Mirando el hierro fundido Juche que sale en avalancha del gran horno electrico, se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros del Complejo incrementaran constantemente la produccion de acero tras sentar esta moderna y magnifica base de produccion del hierro Juche con gran capacidad en pleno acato a la orientacion del partido de materializar la jucheanizacion de la industria metalurgica.
					
					La gasificacion de antracita y la exclusion de coque, que se basan estrictamente en las fuentes nacionales de materias primas, constituyen la filosofia del desarrollo economico de nuestro pais, subrayo y anadio que se debe tomar como linea vital esa valiosa verdad aprendida en la ardua lucha.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante el Complejo.
					
					La tarea mas importante es normalizar en el alto nivel la produccion de materiales de hierro y acero apoyandose en la solida base de produccion del hierro Juche, especifico.
					
					Para ese fin, deben desempenar un rol importante las empresas vinculadas con el Complejo, apunto y continuo que la central electrica, las minas y las otras carboneras, que estan a cargo de proveer de las materias primas, deben producir y abastecer a tiempo de mayor cantidad de electricidad, minerales concentrados de hierro y carbon.
					
					Senalo que la clase obrera del Complejo Siderurgico Hwanghae es la heroica que vino apoyando siempre al partido con el hierro guardando profundamente en el corazon la instruccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung de que esta planta es la "Cota 1211" en el desarrollo de la economia nacional.
					
					Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros del Complejo seran triunfadores orgullosos en la ofensiva final por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera con aquel espiritu e impetu con que mostraban el temperamento del coreano en la reconstruccion posbelica.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Choe Ryong Hae, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ilusion de EE.UU. de atropellar a la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ilusion de EE.UU. de atropellar a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, las figuras de alto rango del Departamento de Defensa norteamericano dijeron que su pais "brindara una ayuda centrada en las fuerzas maritimas y aereas" en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana, "esta asegurando la flexibilidad suficiente para asistir a las fuerzas terrestres de combate", etc.
					 Con anterioridad, el secretario norteamericano de Defensa hablo de que en el caso de desatarse la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, seran despachadas primero las fuerzas maritimas y aereas de EE.UU. y luego, las tropas terrestres adicionales.
					
					Por otra parte, el asistente del secretario de Defensa pronuncio esta frase belicosa: "EE.UU. podra triunfar en la Peninsula Coreana sin armas nucleares".
					
					Esta palabreria deviene la muestra de la invariable ambicion de EE.UU. de agredir a Corea, siendo la locura de que son capaces solo los que consideran como hecho consumado la provocacion de la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 20 y continua:
					
					 Si bien EE.UU. viene diciendo cosas agradables al oido como la "estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana" y la "prevencion de la guerra", en realidad no abandona su ambicion de agredir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y dominar a toda Corea.
					
					 Ahora, la RPDC presento la importantisima y flexible propuesta de concertar el convenio de paz como mejor remedio para establecer la confianza con vistas a la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y se esfuerza sinceramente por ponerla en practica.
					
					 En estos momentos justamente, las fuerzas belicistas de EE.UU. conspiran para agredir a la RPDC soltando tales disparates belicosos, lo cual deviene abierta negacion a la paz y la declaracion de guerra.
					
					Resulta tan inutil, ridiculo e irrealizable el intento de EE.UU. de atropellar a la RPDC con la "supremacia" de sus fuerzas maritimas y aereas.
					
					 Serian muy equivocados los belicistas norteamericanos si piensan que podrian estar a salvo en la eventual guerra de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Ellos deben actuar con prudencia por el destino y el futuro de su propio pais.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena a EE.UU. que difunde "teoria de amenaza de misil"
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena a EE.UU. que difunde "teoria de amenaza de misil"
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- A fin de justificar el desembolso de la enorme suma de 9 mil 900 millones de US $ en el plan del establecimiento del sistema antimisiles, Estados Unidos insiste ahora en que eso es para "hacer frente" a la "amenaza de misil" proveniente de unos paises como la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran.
					En un comentario individual difundido el dia 20, el periodico Minju Joson senalo que no viene al caso el comportamiento de EE.UU. que arma escandalos como si tuviera miedo a los misiles de los paises pequenos.
					
					Se dice que EE.UU. esta relativamente avanzado en la rama de armamentos estrategicos de ataque, pero se muestra demasiado alergico a los misiles ajenos partiendo de su siniestro objetivo, revela el comentarista y continua:
					
					Ahora, de acuerdo a su estrategia militar, EE.UU. entro en el camino de formar en el ambito global una red de defensa antimisil. 
					
					De esta manera, quiere tomar la hegemonia frente a sus rivales en la rama de armamentos estrategicos de ataque y afianzar su dominio militar sobre otros paises.
					
					Parece que el imperio piensa que serian justificadas sus maniobras encaminadas a la carrera armamentista si difunde la supuesta "teoria de amenaza" acusando a Corea, Iran, etc.
					
					Pero, este pensamiento es una ilusion tan irrisoria.
					
					Es que no sera justificada en ningun caso la ambicion de EE.UU. de actuar como policia internacional controlando a su antojo el mundo y, como de esperarse, sera condenada y repudiada por la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exige alzar la consigna "!Servir al pueblo!"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exige alzar la consigna "!Servir al pueblo!"
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- La clave de la victoria en la lucha de hoy por producir un gran auge en la vida del pueblo esta en que los funcionarios sigan levantando en alto la consigna "!Servir al pueblo!" presentada por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en su editorial publicado hoy y continua:
					
					Esa consigna es la bandera revolucionaria para hacer mas ferrea la unidad monolitica de Corea materializando cabalmente la linea revolucionaria de masas del PTC y la combativa que refleja la invariable voluntad de esta entidad de hacer realidad en la tierra patria todos los ideales y felicidades del pueblo.
					
					En ella estan reflejadas la concepcion del PTC sobre el pueblo y su filosofia de amor por este, consistentes en que se debe alcanzar hasta la estrella si la deseara el pueblo.
					
					Son invariables la decision y la voluntad del PTC de desplegar energicamente la ofensiva general por el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo basandose en la gran victoria y los exitos del gran auge revolucionario para que el pueblo coreano, que vino superando duras pruebas siguiendo al partido, disfrute a todo querer de las felicidades provenientes del socialismo.
					
					El ente mas valioso y fuerte del mundo es el pueblo y no hay nada que escatimar para el, he aqui el credo politico del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Gracias a la gran direccion del PTC que realiza todos los ideales del pueblo bajo la consigna arriba mencionada y al ejercito y el pueblo que apoyan con fidelidad la direccion del Songun del partido con su lema de fe "!Si el Partido decide, lo cumplimos!", es definitiva la victoria de la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
